block.powertool.item_display.tooltip: Block version of vanilla Item Frame. A bit tough to break.
block.powertool.item_supplier.tooltip: In creative mode, right-click to permanently put held items in. After that, left-click or right-click to get unlimited items out.
block.powertool.cosmetic_campfire.toolti: No functionality, safe for buildings. Cannot be used as a signal fire.
block.powertool.cosmetic_soul_campfire.t: No functionality, safe for buildings. Cannot be used as a signal fire.
